author: geirm
msg: ClassMap : fix based on patch by Szegedi Attila <szegedia@freemail.hu> that
combines two parts from his patch to provide all publicly accessable methods.
This can certainly be boiled further, I think, but it's a tremendous fix from
Attila, as we can stop the stupid wrapper stuff for the facades we find in
MethodMap : small speed increase in find to reduce the number of Map searches.

author: geirm
msg: Added two new methods, one default, one private.

author: geirm
msg: Changed both to use the Introspector to ensure centralized introspeciton and
caching.  Also, the Introspector will guarantee an invokable, public
method if there is one to be found.
